content: The Sagamore Hotel Miami Beach is a unique artistic venue located just steps from the beautiful sandy beach and the iconic Lincoln Road Mall. The picturesque boutique property is the perfect setting to make your wedding day dreams come true. Our team will ensure that your special day is an unforgettable experience for both you and your guests. We can accommodate an intimate ceremony for 20 guests up to large celebrations of 150 guests.  We work with you to make all your dreams a reality and make sure we provide the best service so your wedding reflects your personal style. We also can help you plan your bachelor and bachelorette events, showers, brunches, and rehearsal dinners.
